_header: I ne may leven on no manner
_description: A mourning song of the Passion — two quatrains explicating ‘Non me possum continere’ which precedes them in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
I ne may leuen on non manerene leten for no
                    þing…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…I se him peined on fele manereIhesu wat sal I
                    seyȝe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 40.
